phases.name: Upgrade to Java 11
phases.description: Upgrade the project from Java 8 to Java 11, addressing any deprecated APIs and ensuring compatibility.
manual_steps: Review and address any manual changes required for the Java 8 to 11 migration, such as updating third-party library dependencies.

phases.name: Migrate to Java 17
phases.description: Upgrade the project from Java 11 to Java 17, addressing any further deprecated APIs and ensuring compatibility.
manual_steps: Review and address any manual changes required for the Java 11 to 17 migration, such as updating third-party library dependencies.

phases.name: Optimize and Refactor
phases.description: Optimize the codebase and refactor any outdated or inefficient code patterns to take advantage of Java 17 features.
manual_steps: Review the codebase and identify opportunities for optimization and refactoring, such as using new language features, improving performance, or enhancing code readability.
Implement the identified optimizations and refactorings manually.

testing_strategy: Implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the application's functionality is maintained throughout the migration process. Utilize automated testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines to streamline the testing workflow.
rollback_plan: In the event of any issues during the migration, have a well-defined rollback plan in place. This may include reverting to the previous Java version, restoring from backups, and implementing a gradual rollout strategy to minimize disruption.
risk_summary: The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 poses a moderate risk due to the potential for compatibility issues and the need to address deprecated APIs. However, by following a phased approach, utilizing automated migration tools, and implementing a robust testing strategy, the overall risk can be effectively managed. The final optimization and refactoring phase will help ensure the codebase is optimized for Java 17 and takes advantage of the latest language features.
